availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Absolom Pollard, Jr. (Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer. Married to Elizabeth Pope Pollard. Married to Winifred Webb Pollard. Farmer in Garrard County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Garrard, District 2, p. 18. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Garrard, not stated, p. 109. Find A Grave, “Absalom Pollard (November 17, 1799-December 5, 1864),” Memorial #79962620, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=79962620 (accessed June 3, 2017).
